text: Abu'l-Barakat al-Husayn ibn Muhammad al-Jarjara'i was a Fatimid official. He was the nephew of the long-serving vizier Ali ibn Ahmad al-Jarjara'i, and became vizier himself in 1048. He held the office for 19 months before being dismissed for his tyrannical behaviour in February 1050 and banished to Tyre. ==References== ==Sources== * * Category:11th-century deaths Category:11th- century Arabs Category:11th-century people of the Fatimid Caliphate Category:Al-Jarjara'i family Category:Viziers of the Fatimid Caliphate Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Abu'l-Barakat al-Husayn al-Jarjara'i
